snippet: In making its declaration, the Obama administration rejected an interpretation by the United Nations and a former top State Department lawyer.
abstract: Obama administration declares that global Bill of Rights-style treaty, International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights, imposes no human rights obligations on American military and intelligence forces when they operate abroad; declaration rejects interpretation by United Nations and State Department during Pres Obama’s first term.
lead_paragraph: In making its declaration, the Obama administration rejected an interpretation by the United Nations and a former top State Department lawyer.

headline.main: U.S., Rebuffing U.N., Maintains Stance That Rights Treaty Does Not Apply Abroad
headline.print_headline: U.S., Rebuffing U.N., Maintains Stance That Rights Treaty Does Not Apply Abroad
